reviews.text: Really good coffee at affordable price! Tried the hot Seoul city latte (espresso + milk + bamboo charcoal) cos it was on promo. The taste was unique with a little bit of saltiness and sweetness not overpowering the coffee and texture was bold and smooth. Hot cappuccino was really good too. Friendly service. Will be back again!

Really lovely spot at the City Gate shopping center. I had a pretty good soy matcha latte and a crispy cronut... so good! Nice ambiance with soft K-Pop in the background and on a Saturday late morning also very busy, but I managed to grab a seat and my order was ready surprisingly fast.

To my surprise I received all my items in biodegradable packaging. What a nice surprise! That's not at all common here in Singapore and very much appreciated.

Veredict: instead of running to Starbucks across the street at the Concouse, show your support to this local business that's doing everything right. It won't disappoint.

Was greeted and served by Xin Yi. She is a nice lady with a very welcoming smile, coffee is great and totally love the shop's environment.
Very comfortable place to sit in and have a break while enjoying their coffees.
5/5 will come back again!

Just happen to walk by as they were closing. Had no prior knowledge or impression of this place, but just had a craving for a drink. Usually I have coffee, but for some reason felt inclined to get a Dirty Matcha Latte hot. Ho man was it good! I was expecting so-so, but was I pleasantly surprised! So surprised that before driving off, just felt moved to leave a good review! Gotta have to try the other stuff now.
Cozy small cafe...drink was okie but differ from what was marketed in the picture in the cafe...so was a bit disappointing...the drink was considered healthy given the choice of milk used.
